option.name: originalContent
option.value:
# syntax=docker/dockerfile:1
FROM ubuntu:latest LABEL authors="lemonlord"
#install ruby RUN sudo apt-get install ruby-full #run bunler for gems RUN bundle install
#create a dir called 'terminal_game' and -- set it as the working dir -- << how to do this? RUN mkdir terminal_game #whatever the set working dir is, do here... maybe
# Copy local terminal_game directory into container COPY . /terminal_game
# Install gems (if Gemfile exists) RUN if [ -f Gemfile ]; then bundle install; fi

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# syntax=docker/dockerfile:1
FROM ubuntu:latest LABEL authors="lemonlord"
#install ruby RUN sudo apt-get install ruby-full #run bunler for gems RUN bundle install
#create a dir called 'terminal_game' and -- set it as the working dir -- << how to do this? RUN mkdir terminal_game #whatever the set working dir is, do here... maybe
# Copy local terminal_game directory into container COPY . /terminal_game
# Install gems (if Gemfile exists) RUN if [ -f Gemfile ]; then bundle install; fi
